Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 8th overall pick, by Cincinnati in 1980...
Earned first career win on 5/26/1982...
Was selected to the 1983 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Injured on 5/22/1990 with a Pulled Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 7 weeks...
Traded from Cincinnati to St. Louis on 7/14/1990 (Going to CIN: 2B M. Lemke, 1B T. Martinez, C P. Clark. Going to STL: 2B S. Sax, P T. Henke, P L. Smith, RF B. Brower, SS J. Valdez)...
Injured on 8/25/1990 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
Won World Series with St. Louis in 1993...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 2/4/1994 to a 3-year deal worth $7,000,000 per year...
